spec_data.Name: texlive-localloc
spec_data.Description:
This package approaches the problem of the shortage of
registers, by providing a mechanism for local allocation. The
package works with Plain TeX, LaTeX and LaTeX 2.09.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:30:34 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Macros for localizing TeX register allocations
